entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 10:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then clearing. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
